name: Secret Little Haven
description: An adventure game about old computers, community, creativity, fandom, gender, and the internet. Alex Cole is a teenage trans girl in 1999 who has yet to figure herself out. She spends much of her free time on the internet, browsing a fan forum for her favorite magical girl show, and chatting with her friends.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Memory: 1024 MB RAM Graphics: Integrated Storage: 115 MB available space Sound Card: Windows Sound System Additional Notes: Some optional extras in the game can only be played on a classic Mac.
